metadata.title: Ranveer Singh DESTROYS Animal's Record! üò± Ranbir Kapoor's Revenge? #Dhurandhar #Animal #Shorts
metadata.description:
The box office has a new King! Ranveer Singh's Dhurandhar has officially crossed 1300 Crores, leaving Ranbir's Animal behind. 

üìç Date: Feb 6, 2026
üìç News: Animal re-releasing in Japan to fight back!

Who is the real GOAT of Bollywood? Comment 'RANBIR' or 'RANVEER'! 

tune with us for more such news
metadata.tags: Ranveer Singh, Ranbir Kapoor, Dhurandhar vs Animal, Box Office 2026, Animal Japan Release

scenes.text: It‚Äôs official! Ranveer Singh‚Äôs Dhurandhar has smashed Animal‚Äôs 915 crore record, crossing 1300 crores worldwide!
Ranbir isn't giving up. Animal is re-releasing in Japan on Feb 13 to take back the crown. Can he do it?

scenes.text: Ranveer's Hamza vs Ranbir's Ranvijay. One is an undercover agent, the other is a wild animal. Who is more dangerous?
